availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Jennie Greathouse. Father of Albert Greathouse. Resident of Hancock County in 1850. Farmer in Hancock County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 280; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 65; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 5; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Lewisport Voting District, p. 2.
